doc.summary: Tracks a field with a value with the same registry name as the current object, registered in the given  registry that is stored in the given field.
doc.text:
Tracks a field with a value with the same registry name as the current object, registered in the given registry that is stored in the given field. The field must not be static and must be a field of the
class that implements Registerable

doc.summary: Tracks a field with a value with the same registry name as the current object with a given suffix,  registered in the given registry that is stored in the given field.
doc.text:
Tracks a field with a value with the same registry name as the current object with a given suffix, registered in the given registry that is stored in the given field. The field must not be static
and must be a field of the class that implements Registerable

doc.summary: Adds a registry tracking action with the same registry name as the current object.
doc.text: Adds a registry tracking action with the same registry name as the current object.

doc.summary: Adds a registry tracking action with the same registry name as the current object with a given suffix.
doc.text: Adds a registry tracking action with the same registry name as the current object with a given suffix.
